#summary Exploring the possibility of a fork.

= Introduction =

The University of Toronto is probably going to only be doing image processing.  The pygame dependency is proving to be a problem; it would be nice to switch to using only PIL.

= Details =

Reformat code to fit [http://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/ Guido's style guide].  The big changes are:

 * Switch to pothole_case.  (As opposed to camelCase.)
 * Switch to 0-based indexing.
